title: #MakeMoreAniviaSkins
body: I believe that Anivia is a underrated champion and does deserve more skins. She is a wonderful champion and I would like to see more skins for my favorite champion. Thank you for reading and I hope you agree.

replies.body:
Anivia is pretty dope. I'd recommend posting this suggestion to the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) as it will get more visibility there and this type of post is better suited there.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you for the recommendation I am glad you also see as Anivia has a great champion.
